alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 2:23AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with isolated higher amounts near Bondurant. Blowing snow with winds gusting 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
